Detailed Description

Params for mflag configuration.

struct Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::gfxMflagHighThreshold

high threshold for mflag generation for gfx pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::gfxMflagLowThreshold

low threshold for mflag generation for gfx pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::globalMflagCtrl

used to control the mflag signal. 0: mflag mechanism is disabled. 1: mflag out of band signal always enabled (force mode for debug). 2: mflag out of band signal is dynamically set and reset based on mflag rules.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::globalMflagStart

used to drive mflag signal when dma buffer is empty at the beginning of pipeline. 0: mflag signal for each pipe kept 0 till preload is reached. 1: Even at the beginning mflag ctrl is used to driver mflag signal.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::vid1MflagHighThreshold

high threshold for mflag generation for vid1 pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::vid1MflagLowThreshold

low threshold for mflag generation for vid1 pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::vid2MflagHighThreshold

high threshold for mflag generation for vid2 pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::vid2MflagLowThreshold

low threshold for mflag generation for vid2 pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::vid3MflagHighThreshold

high threshold for mflag generation for vid3 pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::vid3MflagLowThreshold

low threshold for mflag generation for vid3 pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::wbMflagHighThreshold

high threshold for mflag generation for wb pipe.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam::wbMflagLowThreshold

low threshold for mflag generation for wb pipe.
